alert.note: Alert for Bee; Goliad; Inland Nueces; Inland Refugio; Inland San Patricio; Jim Wells (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 9:36PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Nueces, central San Patricio, southwestern Goliad, northeastern Jim Wells, southwestern Refugio and southeastern Bee Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 936 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near West Sinton, or 7 miles west of Sinton, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sinton, Refugio, Woodsboro, Skidmore, Odem, St. Paul, San Patricio, Edroy, Tynan, West Sinton, Papalote, Bonnie View, Calallen and Blanconia. This includes the following highways... Interstate 37 between mile markers 13 and 33. US Highway 181 between mile markers 596 and 626. US Highway 183 between mile markers 664 and 668. US Highway 59 between mile markers 686 and 692. US Highway 77 between mile markers 618 and 658. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bee; Goliad; Inland Nueces; Inland Refugio; Inland San Patricio; Jim Wells
